content: I was in need of some major repairs to my home, and I am so glad I found this business. Stuart was professional, efficient, and really knew what he was doing.

Stuart was able to fix all of my issues and even made some suggestions for improvements that I hadn't thought of. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for high-quality work and great customer service.
I am so impressed with the work that Stuart did on my home. He was able to take my vision and turn it into a reality.
He was professional, timely, and always made sure to keep me informed throughout the process. I couldn't be happier with the results and would definitely use SDW Carpentry again in the future.
Stuart is always willing to go the extra mile to make sure I was happy with the work. He was able to complete the project on time and within budget, which was a huge relief.
